concept.title: Git integration authentication with SSH Keys in

li.p: Starting from version 7.0.0, Katalon Studio supports connecting to Git with SSH Keys.

conbody.p: In , you can generate and add SSH keys to SSH agents without coding. With SSH keys, you can clone your project from cloud-hosted services of Git and integrate them with . Cloud-based Git services include:
This tutorial shows you how to generate SSH keys and clone a repository from cloud-hosted services of Git with an SSH protocol.

ul.li: An existing cloud-based Git repository for your projects. You can download or clone our CI sample project from our GitHub repository: CI sample.
An existing account for your Git repository of choice.
